meta.title: NewNew - Bid, Vote & Crowdfund Posts
meta.description: Decide what people do next. Vote, bid and crowdfund with the community to watch people do things IRL on NewNew

ac.title: Bid
ac.caption: Send the creator a bid with what you want them to do, how much you're willing to spend, and see if they do your bid.

mc.title: Superpolls
mc.caption: A creator makes a Superpoll that you pay to vote on. When the time's up, watch the creator do the option that gets the most amount of votes.

cf.title: Goal
cf.caption: Pool money with others to back the goals made by your favorite creators. If enough people back the goal, you'll watch the creator do it.
